sourceMeaningMnemonic: A <radical>flowers</radical> <radical>fang</radical> is the bud that comes out of the ground. It's like a little fang, coming from the earth, and it will become a flower someday. This is a little <kanji>sprout</kanji>.
meaningInfo: Imagine a bunch of these. They look like big fangs poking out of the ground (that is, until they bloom and get into the air).
readingMnemonic: When the <kanji>sprout</kanji> gets out of the ground and opens up, instead of a flower there is a human-looking <ja><reading>目</reading></ja> (<ja>め</ja>), looking right at you.
readingInfo: You look at all the sprouts. They have all turned into <ja>目</ja>s, looking straight at you. You're terrified.
